name: Fisherman's Friend Original Extra Strong Cough Suppressant Lozenges, 20 Count (Pack of 2)
short_description: Cough Suppressant: These lozenges are formulated to help suppress coughs and soothe sore throats, providing relief from coughing and throat irritation.
Extra Strong Menthol Flavor: Fisherman's Friend lozenges are known for their strong menthol flavor, which provides a cooling sensation and helps to clear nasal passages.
Sugar-Free: These lozenges are sugar-free, making them a suitable option for those watching their sugar intake.
Convenient Packaging: Each pack contains 20 lozenges, providing a convenient supply for on-the-go use or to keep at home or in the office.
Trusted Brand: Fisherman's Friend is a well-known and trusted brand of throat lozenges, known for their effectiveness in providing relief from coughs and sore throats.
product_description: Fisherman's Friend is known around the world. Discover its power in fighting coughs, soothing throat, and helping clear nasal passages. Does not include artificial flavors or ingredients.

name: HALLS Cough and Throat Relief Cough Drops Variety Pack, Cherry and Mentho-Lyptus, 2 Bulk Packs (400 Drops Total)
short_description: Two bulk packs of HALLS Cough and Throat Relief Cough Drops: 1 pack (200 drops) of Cherry flavor and 1 pack (200 drops) of Mentho-Lyptus flavor (packaging may vary)
HALLS throat drops for sore throat and cough relief with an enjoyable cherry flavor and cooling Mentho-Lyptus flavor
Cough drops made with 5.4 mg (Mentho-Lyptus) or 5.8 mg (Cherry) of menthol per drop to act as an oral anesthetic or cough suppressant; no synthetic dyes
Sore throat drops that provide temporary cough relief and soothe sore throats; use as directed
Individually wrapped cough suppressant lozenges in resealable bags for on-the-go convenience and accessibility for whenever symptoms strike
Packaging may vary. Please refer to the actual packaging for current information for this product
product_description: HALLS Cough and Throat Relief Cough Drops are ready for whatever life throws, or coughs, your way. Made with 5.4 mg (Mentho-Lyptus) or 5.8 mg (Cherry) of menthol per drop, and no synthetic dyes, these sore throat lozenges cool nasal passages, relieve sore throats, and suppress coughs due to a cold. In an enjoyable and refreshing cherry flavor, and cooling Mentho-Lyptus flavor, HALLS menthol cough drops are formulated for adults and children five years and older. Whether you're using these HALLS cough drops for sore throat relief, cough relief, or as an oral anesthetic, simply dissolve one drop slowly in your mouth and repeat every two hours as needed. This HALLS Cough Drop Variety Pack includes two bulk bags, each resealable bulk pack contains 200 individually wrapped cough drops for adults and older children, great for tossing in pockets, backpacks, and tote bags for convenient access when symptoms strike.

name: Vicks VapoCool Severe Sugar Free, Medicated Sore Throat Drops, Max Strength Menthol, Soothes Sore Throat Pain, Winterfrost Flavor, 30ct
short_description: FAST SORE THROAT RELIEF, SUGAR FREE. Simply let the Vicks VapoCOOL Sugar Free drop dissolve in your mouth for a powerful rush of Vicks Vapors
POWERFUL RELIEF. It’s not your grandma’s sugar free cough drop, it’s Vicks VapoCOOL Severe with intense cooling power that starts working in seconds.
VAPORIZE SORE THROAT PAIN. When you need something powerful to soothe your worst sore throat pain that might’ve come from that terrible cough.
2X MORE MENTHOL per drop vs. the leading competitive [menthol] drop.
DELIGHTFUL WINTERFROST FLAVOR, that's also sugar free
FOR MORE SORE THROAT RELIEF, also try Vicks VapoCOOL Lozenges and Sore Throat Spray in Winterfrost flavor.
Intended for use by Adults and Children Ages 12+
product_description: Vicks VapoCool Severe Sugar Free Medicated Sore Throat Drops start working in seconds to deliver a powerful rush of Vicks Vapors and soothe your worst sore throat pain. From the makers of Vicks, the world's #1 selling cough and cold brand.* For over 85 years, Vicks has been a trusted choice for drops to tackle sore throats. Specially formulated with menthol, a powerful oral anesthetic, you can vaporize your sore throat pain and help with scratchy throats. For maximum strength relief, Vicks VapoCOOL SEVERE combines the winterfrost flavor with the effectiveness of max strength menthol in a sore throat drop. Next time you reach for cough drops, look at the level of menthol they contain. VapoCool Severe Sugar Free is definitely not your grandma’s cough drop, it's powerful sore throat relief. To use, dissolve one drop slowly in the mouth. Repeat every 2 hours as needed or as directed by a doctor. VapoCOOL SEVERE Drops are intended for use by adults and children 12 years of age or older. Should not be used by children under 12 years of age.Vicks has your sore throat covered! Also try Vicks VapoCOOL Sore Throat Spray - available in Winterfrost flavor. *Nicholas Hall's global OTC sales database, DB6

name: Ricola MAX Nasal Care Cool Menthol Drops with Extra Menthol - Maximum Nasal Comfort and Sore Throat Relief for Cold & Flu Symptoms - 34 Count - Herbal Throat Lozenges
short_description: EXTRA MENTHOL, MAXIMUM RELIEF: Ricola's strongest throat drop yet, with 15.3 mg of menthol, 3x the menthol of Ricola Original Herb Throat Drops; Soothes the worst sore throats and cools nasal passages for powerful relief

SWISS HERBS, NATURAL FLAVOR: Ricola cough drops and throat drops are crafted with Ricola's signature 10-herb blend, grown in the pristine Swiss Alps, for a refreshing, naturally-derived flavor made with no artificial coloring or dyes

COLD & FLU SYMPTOM RELIEF: For throat and nasal irritation throughout the cold season, Ricola MAX Nasal Care Drops with Extra Strength Menthol deliver maximum cooling comfort when environmental allergens, indoor heat, cold & flu symptoms, and dry air cause throat discomfort

EVERYDAY, EVERYWHERE CARE: Keep a bag of Ricola MAX Nasal Care on hand for maximum sore throat and nasal comfort during cold and flu season; For everyday throat comfort, try Ricola Honey Herb Cough Drops and Ricola Sugar Free Lemon Mint Drops

HERBAL HERITAGE YOU CAN TRUST: Backed by generations of Swiss expertise, Ricola blends its signature Alpine herbs for a naturally unique flavor in every lozenge; Trusted by families worldwide for everyday throat care
product_description: Experience maximum nasal comfort and sore throat relief with Ricola MAX Nasal Care Throat Drops. Each drop delivers extra menthol, 3x more than Ricola Original Herb Throat Drops, to soothe throat irritation and cool nasal passages. Ricola MAX helps ease throat irritation, discomfort, and dryness to help you speak more comfortably. Made with Ricola's signature Swiss Alpine herb blend and extra menthol, these herbal throat lozenges combine naturally refreshing flavor with effective relief from cold and flu symptoms. Whether you're battling a sore throat or irritated nasal passages, Ricola MAX Nasal Care delivers cooling, menthol relief you can count on. Stock up for home, work, and travel so soothing relief is always within reach.

name: Mucinex InstaSoothe Sore Throat + Cough Relief Alpine Herbs & Mint Flavor, Fast Acting, Cooling Comfort, Powerful Sore Throat Oral Pain Reliever, 40 Medicated Drops
short_description: MUCINEX SORE THROAT + COUGH RELIEF DROPS: Kick that pesky cough to the curb with Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat + Cough Relief medicated drops; Contains a cough suppressant & an oral pain reliever that provides sore throat relief
FAST ACTING SORE THROAT LOZENGES: Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat Drops + Cough provide up to 4 hours of cough relief

ALPINE HERBS & FRESH MINT FLAVOR SORE THROAT DROPS: These sore throat + cough medicated drops are powered by a unique formula containing Dextromethorphan HBr & Hexlyresorcinol, not menthol like other cough drops

ON-THE-GO COUGH MEDICINE & SORE THROAT RELIEF: Each Mucinex cough drop is individually wrapped & sealed for your convenience, so you don't have to worry about them unwrapping & sticking in your pocket or bag

BE PREPARED FOR COLD & FLU SEASON: Mucinex has a wide range of cough, cold and flu health care products to help your family get through cold & flu season, such as cough/sore throat lozenges, sore throat spray, cold medicine, and cough medicine
product_description: Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat + Cough Relief medicated throat drops/cough drops have a powerful 3 in 1 formula that relieves, soothes, and numbs sore throats. These alpine herbs & fresh mint flavor sore throat lozenges provide rapid sore throat relief and up to 4 hours cough relief. These non menthol cough drops contain 2 powerful active ingredients: Dextromethorphan HBr, a cough suppressant, helps provide cough relief, and Hexylresorcinol, an oral pain reliever, provides powerful sore throat relief. Each cough drop has less than 10 calories and 2.5g of sugar (no artificial sweeteners here!). Adults and children 12 years of age and over: take 2 lozenges (one immediately after the other) and allow each lozenge to dissolve slowly in the mouth; may be repeated every 4 hours as needed, not to exceed 12 lozenges in any 24-hour period. Children 6 to under 12 years of age: take 1 lozenge and allow product to dissolve slowly in the mouth; may be repeated every 4 hours as needed, not to exceed 6 lozenges in any 24-hour period. Children under 6 years of age: do not use. Looking for honey flavored sore throat drops? Try our Mucinex Instasoothe Sore Throat + Soothing Comfort Echinacea & Honey flavor drops. For sore throat spray, try Mucinex Instasoothe Kickstart Sore Throat Winterfresh Flavor Spray. Look for Mucinex Fast-Max for cough & cold medicine to help get you through cold and flu season.

product_description: Sometimes our bodies need support. Whether starting a new workout program, rounding out what you put on your plate or simply balancing the pressures of the day to day, our aisles are stocked with supplement choices that adhere to our strict standards — perfect additions to any self-care routine. We devote time to research the ingredients that go into the vitamins, minerals, herbs and other supplements on our shelves. Because you're important to us, we prohibit over 150 ingredients in our supplements, including hydrogenated oils, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as sucralose, saccharin and aspartame. We seek out and have long-standing relationships with trusted brands — many of whom are pioneers in the supplements industry.
